reviewText: The fires depicted have a strange color. The only menu item with fire sounds only is so huge its scary. Music blasts on most menu selections. The fires burn too quickly as though on fast forward and I can't really see any HD effects. I cannot recommend this DVD. I would like to return it.

reviewText: I honestly don't know what I expected out of this product.  I suppose I wanted it to transport me to a snow-covered cabin in the north woods, put me in a terrycloth robe and slippers, and hand me a cup of cocoa.  While it didn't quite accomplish those dreamy things, it succeeded in being exactly what it purports to be:  an well produced video fireplace.The picture is crisp and the sound crisper.  Each video is automatically set up to loop continuously, so no reprogramming of your DVD player is necessary for long-term play.  Mercifully, only one of the nine video options has any of the panning or camera movement you may read about on some other videos, which is just fine because a real fireplace doesn't pan or zoom... right?  (The lone exception is a fire kalidescope of sorts - too psychedelic for my taste and the only track that's pretty much a throw-away.)The lighting is consistent as is the overall tone of each scene.  The views featuring a mantle outline vs. just the logs-n-flames are split about 50-50, with one scene focused tightly on the flames alone.  The logs appear to be real as they collapse on themselves over time, but I believe the fires are supplemented by gas as they seem (at least in the early stages of each scene) to burn almost TOO consistently.  The holiday-decorated scene looks like a display you might see at your local department store -- it's cheesy but charming in its own campy way.The choice of 7 different audio tracks (3 music tracks with or without fire crackling background, plus the fire sounds alone) is a nice feature.  I doubt I'll ever watch this video with the music tracks provided as unfortunately they're not of very good performance quality and therefore not terribly relaxing.  Again, it's a nice option to be able to turn them off.While overall, it's not exactly compelling video, it's not supposed to be.  It's lovely to have when setting a relaxing mood.  Pardon me while I pop it in... and grab my own robe and slippers.
summary: Great at being what it is... with tempered expectations

reviewText: We actually bought this last Christmas one year ago.  Several different fires scenes to choose from, with or without music.  I think it's very nice for what it is.
Title: N/A

reviewText: "Hey, let's throw a log on the fire" is what we say in our house, now that we have this DVD. Only it's really so much easier to pop the disc into the player, choose the scene, and let it go!There is a wide choice of fire scenes, both log and gas, some with simple fireplaces, some more elaborate. There's one scene with a Christmas fireplace, complete with a toy train and some milk and cookies for Santa that's very cute. One scene features a campfire and another depicts a fireplace with candles.You can also choose different sound settings -- holiday music, relaxing instrumental (which at first I thought was going to be wierd, New-Agey sitar music, but is actually quite nice) as well as some cheerful classical music. You can also opt for silence or just the sound of the fire's crackling.This DVD is so well done and very inexpensive. My whole family has enjoyed it so much, I've been thinking about purchasing other copies to give as hostess or Christmas gifts to friends who don't have fireplaces.
Title: N/A

reviewText: This is not the absolute perfect fireplace DVD, but I have no regrets about purchasing it.  You'll love the options available (different fireplaces and sounds, etc) and the picture is great.  My only wish is that each fire was shown from beginning to end, from initial roaring flames down to the dying embers, which is the only reason I didn't give 5 stars.  I have watched it dozens of times, and I especially enjoy reading in front of it.  PLEASANT, RELAXING AND REALISTIC... RECOMMENDED!
Title: N/A
